name: The chaos dice is on the loose!
name_original: The chaos dice is on the loose!
description:
Made with <3 in <48h for GMTK Game Jam 2022. Theme: "Roll of the Dice".

The chaos dice is on the loose!

Help it escape from this nightmarish world (*ahem*) by... rolling to the end...?

Beware, as each throw will unleash unexpected consequences upon the dice and the world around it!

Very (very) short and basic prototype for something that could easily be expanded.

Controls:

- Click, drag away from the cube and release to shoot it through the level!

- Reach the end area with the flag, with as few strokes as possible :)

- R to restart current level

- Hold right-click to rotate the camera

Made from scratch for the gamejam by @elFlashor
